title: Appropriate music for reading Bloodlines

embed.description: Extracted from music.big http://i.imgur.com/8oDrZY2.png However, this is now available to buy officially as part of the OST on steam. Do consider buying - it will increase the likelihood of a Homeworld 3. http://store.steampowered.com/app/352590/

body: Give credit to Paul Ruskay. The guy's a musical genius.

replies.body: I mostly wrote it to the Titanfall soundtrack by Stephen Barton or Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare by Harry Gregson-Williams...
Neat, but Homeworld will always have a special place in my heart. It's just such a great game.

> [{quoted}](name=Yousosmart,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=s0pE0pRr,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-06-02T18:16:10.154+0000)
>
> Neat, but Homeworld will always have a special place in my heart. It's just such a great game.

True, dat. Don't have the original Homeworld OST, but I have Homeworld 2 OST, and that's great mood music for writing.
Oh my god the Homeworld thread pic made my day. Thank you for reminding me of this awesome game, friend!
